senses.sense_definition: Действительное причастие прошедшего времени от глагола <w>отговориться</w>.

examples.text: Студент, <w>отговорившийся</w> плохим самочувствием, остался дома и пропустил важную лекцию.

target_lang_translations.en: The student, having <w>excused himself</w> due to feeling unwell, stayed home and missed an important lecture.

examples.text: Сотрудник, ловко <w>отговорившийся</w> от участия в скучном собрании, пошёл пить кофе.

target_lang_translations.en: The employee, who cleverly <w>got out of</w> participating in the boring meeting, went to drink coffee.

target_lang_definitions.en: Active past participle describing someone who has avoided a task, obligation, or situation by providing an excuse or reason.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: having given a reason to be released from a duty
cited a specific reason (like illness) to avoid something
informal; avoided doing something by making an excuse
